headline: How Micron’s New York Megafab Groundbreaking And Taiwan Fab Deal At Micron Technology (MU) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Micron Technology has already broken ground on its megafab in Onondaga County, New York, part of a planned US$100.00 billion complex that could house up to four fabs and become the largest semiconductor memory facility in the United States. Coupled with a planned US$1.80 billion acquisition of Powerchip’s P5 fab in Taiwan, these moves underline Micron’s push to add high-end memory capacity tailored to AI demand amid what it calls an unprecedented global memory-chip shortage. We’ll now...

headline: 2026’s Biggest AI Trends: The Memory Explosion | MU Stock, SNDK Stock, SK Hynix, CAMT Stock
summary: 24/7 Wall St. Analysts Eric Bleeker and Austin Smith are kicking the New Year off in style with 12 trends for AI investors to watch in 2026. Over the course of 12 videos, the two will share their thoughts on everything from the memory explosion to software stocks to robotics. In this video we'll discuss why memory stocks like SanDisk (Nasdaq: SNDK), Micron (Nasdaq: MU), and SK Hynix took off in 2025 and why their stocks are continuing to run in 2026. We'll also discuss some strategies for investing in the trend in 2026 such as buying semiconductor equipment companies in the space like Camtek (Nasdaq: CAMT).

content.title: 2026’s Biggest AI Trends: The Memory Explosion | MU Stock, SNDK Stock, SK Hynix, CAMT Stock
content.description:
24/7 Wall St. Analysts Eric Bleeker and Austin Smith are kicking the New Year off in style with 12 trends for AI investors to watch in 2026. Over the course of 12 videos, the two will share their thoughts on everything from the memory explosion to software stocks to robotics.

In this video we'll discuss why memory stocks like SanDisk (Nasdaq: SNDK), Micron (Nasdaq: MU), and SK Hynix took off in 2025 and why their stocks are continuing to run in 2026. We'll also discuss some strategies for investing in the trend in 2026 such as buying semiconductor equipment companies in the space like Camtek (Nasdaq: CAMT).
content.summary: 24/7 Wall St. Analysts Eric Bleeker and Austin Smith are kicking the New Year off in style with 12 trends for AI investors to watch in 2026. Over the course of 12 videos, the two will share their thoughts on everything from the memory explosion to software stocks to robotics. In this video we'll discuss why memory stocks like SanDisk (Nasdaq: SNDK), Micron (Nasdaq: MU), and SK Hynix took off in 2025 and why their stocks are continuing to run in 2026. We'll also discuss some strategies for investing in the trend in 2026 such as buying semiconductor equipment companies in the space like Camtek (Nasdaq: CAMT).
